archive_pointer_iserializer.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ARCHIVE_POINTER_ISERIALIZER_POINTER_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ARCHIVE_POINTER_ISERIALIZER_POINTER_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // archive_pointer_iserializer.hpp
00011

00019 #include <cassert>
00020 #include <cstddef> // NULL
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00023 
00024 #include <boost/archive/detail/basic_serializer.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/archive/detail/basic_pointer_iserializer.hpp>
00026 
00027 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00028 
00029 namespace boost {
00030 
00031 namespace serialization {
00032     class extended_type_info;
00033 } // namespace serialization
00034 
00035 namespace archive {
00036 namespace detail {
00037 
00038 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_iarchive;
00039 
00040 template<class Archive>
00041 class archive_pointer_iserializer : 
00042     public basic_pointer_iserializer {
00043 protected:
00044     explicit BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00045     archive_pointer_iserializer(
00046         const boost::serialization::extended_type_info & eti
00047     );
00048     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00049     // account for bogus gcc warning
00050     #if defined(__GNUC__)
00051     virtual
00052     #endif
00053     ~archive_pointer_iserializer();
00054 public:
00055     virtual const basic_iserializer & get_basic_serializer() const 
00056     // mscvc 6.0 requires template functions to be implemented. For this
00057     // reason we can't make abstract.
00058     #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1300) || defined(__MWERKS__)
00059     {
00060         assert(false);
00061         return *static_cast<const basic_iserializer *>(NULL);
00062     }
00063     #else
00064     = 0;
00065     #endif
00066     virtual void load_object_ptr(
00067         basic_iarchive  & ar, 
00068         void * & x,
00069         const unsigned int file_version
00070     ) const 
00071     #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1300) || defined(__MWERKS__)
00072     {
00073         assert(false);
00074     }
00075     #else
00076     = 0;
00077     #endif
00078     // return the type_extended load pointer corresponding to a given
00079     // type_info.  returns NULL if there is no such instance. This
00080     // would indicate that the no object of the specified type was loaded
00081     // any where in the code.
00082     static BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(const basic_pointer_iserializer *)
00083     find(
00084         const boost::serialization::extended_type_info & eti
00085     );
00086 };
00087 
00088 } // namespace detail
00089 } // namespace archive
00090 } // namespace boost
00091 
00092 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00093 
00094 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ARCHIVE_POINTER_ISERIALIZER_POINTER_HPP
